config.js.no_class_provided:
You must provide the class name 
 > !config <ClassName> 

If you have any questions, message me privately (number is in the description)
config.js.class_not_found:
I couldn't find a class with that name! 
Note: Make sure to include the leading zero in the name (e.g., 09b)
config.js.no_config_found: No configuration found for this chat

room.js.no_room_provided:

Example: ${args0} 208
room.js.room_doesnt_exist: This room doesn't exist. Maybe try another term for the room
room.js.currently_no_class:
There's currently no class in session!

You can also query other lessons. Example: 
`${args0} ${args1} lesson:1`
room.js.no_class_in_room: There is currently no class in this room!
room.js.output_footer:

`${args0} ${args1} lesson:1`
